subject: Football
Murders and Attempted Murders
Assaults
lead_paragraph: Charles Grant was stabbed in the neck and charged with involuntary manslaughter in the fatal shooting of a pregnant woman after an altercation at a nightclub in southwest Georgia.
snippet: Charles Grant was stabbed in the neck and charged with involuntary manslaughter in the fatal shooting of a pregnant woman after an altercation at a nightclub in southwest Georgia.
